title: The intersection of nanotechnology and urban agriculture: applications of carbon dots
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00709C, Tutorial Review
Hanfeng Zhang, Yue Wang, Tiantian Zheng, Ting Li, Rui Gao, Wenzhe Liu, Qing Chi
Amidst the ongoing urbanization process, the significance of urban agriculture has garnered increasing attention.
